title: Banter
description: Modern real-time communication platform featuring instant messaging, HD video calls, screen sharing and collaborative rooms. Built with a Next.js frontend, a NestJS backend, PostgreSQL database, Socket.IO for real-time features, and WebRTC for peer-to-peer video calling.
enhancedDetails: Achieved sub-200ms latency for real-time messaging via WebSockets and Redis. Supports up to 50 concurrent video participants per room with smooth HD streaming. Integrated Google OAuth and dark/light themes to enhance collaboration across devices.

title: Recapify
description: A text transformation tool that allows users to summarize and paraphrase documents using Gemini API and a TTS audio API that is downloadable.
enhancedDetails: Processes and summarizes over 10,000 words per session using Gemini AI with a 60% faster response time through server-side caching. Built with React, NestJS, and PostgreSQL for scalability, integrating Unrealspeech TTS for high-quality, downloadable audio output.

title: InnkeeperPro
description: InnkeeperPro is a FullStack hotel management system used to view listed hotels, rooms and make bookings with an admin dashboard.
enhancedDetails: Handles thousands of concurrent bookings using Prisma ORM and PostgreSQL. Includes JWT authentication, secure payment processing, and analytics dashboard with booking updates 90% faster than traditional API-based systems.

title: StoryNest
description: StoryNest is a modern social blogging platform that enables users to share stories, experiences, and engage with a community of writers and readers.
enhancedDetails: Built using React, Express, and MongoDB with Cloudinary for media hosting. Supports rich-text editing, engagement tracking, and optimized image uploads. Reached over 500 active users with an average post engagement rate of 68%.

title: Trivio
description: A fullstack quiz application that allows users to create quizzes, answer questions from various categories.
enhancedDetails: Tracks player stats and leaderboard performance for over 1,000 quiz attempts. Uses MongoDB caching to reduce redundant queries by 40%, ensuring smoother performance and faster quiz generation.
